clinical_history: Routine obstetric ultrasound for fetal growth.
technique: Longitudinal, transverse, and oblique views obtained.
findings: Major vessels show well-defined waveform on Doppler.
Breast tissue shows isoechoic lesion measuring 1.78 mm.
No evidence of DVT; veins compressible with normal flow.
Gallbladder shows well-defined, no stones or wall thickening.
Prostate is unremarkable; volume approximately 31.36 cc.
Common bile duct measures 16.77 mm, within normal limits.
